bibl.title: Postcard from P.M. Hamer to Philip Showalter Hench, June 30, 1941

div1.p: Hamer acknowledges Hench's letter and promises he will give his attention to the matter.

div1.head: Postcard from P.M. Hamer to Philip Showalter Hench, June 30, 1941

opener.dateline:
THE NATIONAL ARCHIVES
DIVISION OF REFERENCE
June 30, 1941

div1.p:
This is to acknowledge receipt of your communication dated
June 25, 1941.

The matter is receiving attention, and you will receive an answer
as promptly as possible.
div1.closer:
Yours very truly, P. M. Hamer
·Chief, Division of Reference. Form K-10
CPO 120447
